alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LOUISA...NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...GOOCHLAND...WEST CENTRAL HANOVER...NORTH CENTRAL AMELIA...POWHATAN AND EASTERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakeside Village to near Moseley. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Powhatan, Cartersville, Duncan, Lakeside Village, and Trenholm around 240 PM EDT. Fork Union and Columbia around 245 PM EDT. Goochland, Sabot, and Fife around 250 PM EDT. Palmyra and Oilville around 255 PM EDT. Hadensville, Kents Store, and Gum Spring around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Orchid, Crozier, Rock Castle, Oak Forest, Vontay, Maidens, Three Square, Irwin, Johnsons Springs, and Whiteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
